messages.title: Only the Lib Dems can beat Labour in Newcastle East!
messages.content: Everyone knows elections in Newcastle East are a close contest between the Liberal Democrats and Labour. The Conservatives have no councillors and can't win here. More and more people are switching to back Lib Dem campaigner Wendy Taylor to deliver fair taxes and get things done. Every vote for Wendy is a vote for real action on jobs, on crime, on schools and the NHS, and the environment. Only the Lib Dems are promising fairer local spending, student fees, and real political change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Every vote for Wendy is a vote for real action on jobs.
Every vote for Wendy is a vote for real action on crime.
Every vote for Wendy is a vote for real action on schools.
Every vote for Wendy is a vote for real action on the NHS.
Every vote for Wendy is a vote for real action on the environment.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a close contest between Lib Dem Wendy Taylor or Gordon Brown's right hand man for Labour.

images.caption: Dr. Wendy Taylor: Change for good for Newcastle East
